Source.Name: pisi
Source.Summary: PISI is the package management system of Pardus
Source.Description: PISI is a modern package management system implemented in Python. Some of its main features are: package sources are written in XML and python, implements all functions through a simple-to-use API, integrates low-level and high-level package management features.

Update.Comment: Make sure that index pool is safely closed and joined.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Add Turkish comment for Pisi mimetype, pb#18193. Thanks to Anıl Özbek.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Make indexing in a parallel fashion by distributing per-package parsing/calculation to seperate worker processes.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Rework kerneltools again. Don't pass explicit abiVersion in actions.py
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Split string passed to System.Manager.reinstallPackage method
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Add reinstallPackage method to comar script
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Refactor language function, fixes faulty parsing problem
Update.Name: Fatih Arslan

Update.Comment: Provides functions that is needed for Texlive 2009.
Update.Name: Fatih Arslan

Update.Comment: Remove Makefile checks in cmaketools module. User may provide -C option as make parameter.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Extend qt4 actionsapi patch to fix qmake cxxflags override problem
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Add kde4 and qt4 actionsapi modules.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: - Update config files for Pardus 2011 - Drop arts patch as it is not needed for Pardus 2011
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Fix empty messages returned by System.Manager backend
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: l10n: Improve 2 messages and their translations.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Add another qt3 path to sandbox whitelist
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Add patch to fix thinko when looking for relocated files
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment:
Bump to the second alpha for the upcoming 2.3.x releases.
* Minor refactoring and cosmetic changes * Important bug fixes related to delta packages * The installation of pisi packages with the old format is fixed.
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Revert r27902 for now as it causes a regression
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Add config files as additional files. Package is ready for build on x86_64.
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: * Allow comparing Version objects with strings * Add target attribute to Archive tag. It can be used to extract the archive into a sub-directory. * Remove the check for repository architecture * Replace FileError with ctx.ui.error since FileError is defined in pisitoolsfunctions. * Add Maintainer tag to components.xml. * Real fix for #6748: The exception is raised both in getcwd() and chdir() * Blacklisted system.base packages aren't really ignored during update (#9991) * Feature: Add ability to avoid source packages from building on specific architectures * Feature: Use AdditionalFiles in Source tags * Feature: Add ability to use multiple Archive tags for a source package * Use glob.glob0 and lstrip instead of glob.glob to fix exceptions raising when an invalid file path is used.
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: * pisi error message sanitization (ozan) * Don't wait until packaging for borking about invalid version strings (ozan) * AnyDependency with attribute fix for no pisi warning when the last anydep is removed * Add support for reverse applying a patch with Patch reverse="[tT]rue" (ozan) * Handle urllib2 errors of dummy .part files created as a result of unreachable translations.xml's. (sdalgic) [#12136] * Add repo arch,dist,dist_release getter methods to RepoDB * Add repo arch and dist check for pisi add-repo
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: Do not ignore parameter in make method (eg. perl Build test) of perlmodules.py. Tests of some perl modules have never run before this commit.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: * Do not force replaced package upgrades for system.base upgrade planning * Add get_package_requirements method to pisi api * Implement get.ARCH() in actionsapi (ozan) * Translation updates (patrik, klemens)
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: * Fix pisi hs quit problem (fatih) * Translation fixes (philippe.svetoslavsky, patrik, atolboo, klemens) * Actions api fixes (ozan)
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: Apply commit r23485 (sort the files according to their path names before adding them to the tarfile.) for delta packages.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Change CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE to RelWithDebInfo in cmaketools to get faster and less verbose KDE packages.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Fix delta package upgrade problem for broken packages and change config files
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: * Fix distribution name and release in pisi.conf, * Replaces now supports divided packages also (#8561) * Fix for the recursive reverseDependencyUpdate problem (#11406) * Add Requires.Action ... support to scenario api * Dutch language update (atoolbo) * Install DB changes and API methods for needs{Restart,Reboot} feature (bahadir) * Fix for a zero division error in fetcher * Raise meaningful warning when translations.xml has invalid XML (#8969) (serdar) * update and minor revision of some spanish language (klemens) * Check individual packages' Distribution Release and architecture properties before installing them (serdar) * Swedish translation (patrik) * Let localname for Components be optional * Warn if component.xml is not found in the upper directory, set PartOf as "unknown" (serdar) * Fix pisi delta's not carrying file permission changes * Add libc header excludes support for action script (ozan) * scenarioapi python 2.6 syntax fix * Do not append dbginfo of the debug package to partOf (ozan) * Add replace attribute to config files * use /tmp for unpacking a pisi package (ozan) * KeepSpecial should control pod file removal, not actionapi's perl install * change fixLocalPod to removePackList, pods are removed by pisi * Remove emptied dirs after KeepSpecial operation (#11588)
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: - Update mirrors.conf for sourceforge projects, archive URLs may also need update according to the project, - Disable cyclic garbage collector of Python to avoid comar segmentation faults under high load (#11110).
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: * Translation updates * File that already exists is the destination file, not the source file. Print the correct error message about symlinks. (gokcen) * New urlgrabber with pycurl backend support changes
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: Fix fileinfo patterns for the new code using python magic module
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: * pisi fetch command added * AnyDependency remove fixes * Normalize target paths of symbolic links (#10976) (fatih) * Add suffix and remove_suffix, remove rstrip usage (fatih) * Remove empty config dirs fix * Remove unfound local repos fix * Translation updates (philippe.svetoslavsky, atolboo) * Fix replace package problem first seen with (udev - udev-extras) * Fix matching of translations against sub-packages. (ozan) * Emerge should install the package whether it is installed or not (#11044) * Fix unpisi (#10892) * check inactive repos also while adding a new repository (#10873) (Serdar Dalgıç) * colorize pisi lr output (#25637) (Serdar Dalgıç) * fix for permission error for not owning dir (#6748) * added ArchiveBzip2 for only bzipped file (ozan) * Use python magic module instead of spawning file process to improve performance (ozan)
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: Add optional destDir parameter to pisitools.dohtml as pisitools.dodoc supports.
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: * handle packages which are not kernel modules, install symlink in the kernel-source package. * remove tar file, the output of lzma decompress, only original archive file should stay here. (#10680) * do not whine if locked by the same process before (#10568) * really fix the abandoned file checking when the path in pspec.xml and the actual path of a missed file intersects. (ozan) * allow file:// protocol to work (Serdar Dalgıç) (#10511) * give file not found error for a non-existing pspec file (Serdar Dalgıç) * drop removeLaFiles as its functionality is built-in to pisi and it has never been used * support should be added to pass a source directory to dodoc (fatih) * pisi build command now works in debug mode unless -q or --quiet parameter is passed. (Serdar Dalgıç) (#10052) * Advanced search parameters added. pisi can now search only by name, summary or description of a package. (Jérôme Schneider) (#9240) * tarZ support for archives (Serdar Dalgıç) (#6715) * handle not-existed working directory problems instead of giving exceptions (caglar) * Add pisi.xml file for packagekit mime checking * translation updates
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: Add destDir parameter to specify doc directory's name with dodoc.
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Call update_cache inside try block else if run in finally block it may update db caches with the old data when SIGTERM or some other exception is caught.
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: Take into account downloaded partial files for cached package info
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: Add a generic cache consistency check to lazydb and use it to detect stale installdb cache
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: * Set default compression to 1 * plan_upgrade fix for replaced packages
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: Remove fetcherror exception handling of comar script
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: * Do not use delta between major release upgrades fix * kerneltools refactorings (ozan) * pisi up -c component fix * no fail in comar script * reinstall fix for pm-install in comar script
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: * pisi now installs any pisi file without asking anything * pass relative paths to patches to quilt (fatih) * fix dist upgrade bug. pisi up now looks to distro and distro release before build no * fix pisi search sometimes not returning results from summary and description * add search_in_packages method to packagedb for pm * change default make job number from 1 to 3 (onur) * performance improvement for update_repositories script * fix a cancel error in comar script * translation updates
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: * Added ignore_safety swith to pisi.conf * Remove dependencies from debug packages * pisi up now looks distro and distro_release before build_no * Fix a pisi ln bug where the default command was showing the new packages since from the first repo update to today where it should only show since the latest repo update. * New command: pisi blame * New command: pisi {enable,disable}-repo * Fix wrong word usage: deactive -> inactive * Fix an harmless cache update bug, where new cache info was not being saved after regeneration, was only being saved on another priviledged operation
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: * get_isa_packages for package and install db * raise BadZipfile exception with package info. Used by YALI. * regenerate caches after repo updates
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: Add fix to reset environment correctly
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: PackageKit groups support, match PK groups with pisi components
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: list_repos should always show all repos
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: set repo activity api, delta upgrade fixes
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: fix for manager.py for new pm, kerneltools and texlivemodules changes
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: comar modal changed according to strict xml rules
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: Timeout fix for comar, do not cache configpending info
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: Dont use distutils for version check, install image does not have distutils module
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: Use destination path for cache fix
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: Call Link.setLocale method to localize COMAR replies.
Update.Name: Bahadır Kandemir

Update.Comment: * New pisi command: pisi list-newest [--since yyyy-mm-dd] [--last nth_previous_repo_ update] * Fixes bugs (#9021, #9038, #9020, #4113, #9089, #8811, #8361, #9101, #8845, #8123, #6157, #9156, #9083)
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: * pisi delta package symlink related bug fix discovered on virtualbox delta package * Regression fix on upgrade operation about reverse dep calculations (#9038)
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: * pisi sf performance improvement when full path is given * Add pisi check --config to find changed config files * Fix the layout issue of 'pisi help' * Check return value of actionapi calls
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: * Fallback to "en" locale when nothing found in summary and description, or no local translation exists. (#7995)
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: * Replaced package upgrades regression fix * Fix optional and mandatory problem of Requires and Action tags when pisi.spec.SpecFile is used
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: * Install now works as upgrade, downloads all and then installs * Requires/Action/{reverseDependencyUpdate,systemRestart,serviceRestart} tags * pisi check symlink problem (#7336) * Fixed bugs (#5493, #5619, #7336, #5370, #8623, #8379, #4539, #8515, #8501, #8426, #8145, #7328)
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: German translations updated by Mustafa Ölcerman
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Added comu.edu.tr to kde mirrors list
Update.Name: İşbaran Akçayır

Update.Comment: Allow dot in reponame. Used before and required for Kurulan CD.
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: Override default D-Bus timeout in all method calls
Update.Name: Bahadır Kandemir

Update.Comment: clear cache should read cache_limit every time

Update.Comment: manager.py fixes and comar first upgrade bug fix
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: Comar 2.0 script changes, signal handler fix for pm

Update.Comment: pisi cp can take package args now. Needed for baselayout.

Update.Comment: Run registerState() after registering System.Service scripts

Update.Comment: YALI decompress index to read-only filesystem, set_signal_handling added to api

Update.Comment: comar-dbus support merged, pisi info sourcepkg support, pisi em -c component support

Update.Comment: COMAR 2.0 support added. System.Manager (Package.Manager) script removed.

Update.Comment: Merge libtool and downgrading bug fixes, remove bsddb3.db dependency and pisi-cli2.5
Update.Name: Ekin Meroğlu

Update.Comment: Upgrade --fetch-only needs write access to database
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: upgradePackage upgrades all packages when no package is given

Update.Comment: po updates, file conflicts problem solution

Update.Comment: from import changes, inspect bug fix
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: index should take latest versioned packages
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: do not try to strip symlinks
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: File conflicts bug fixed, search db optimizations, signal handling and other bug fixes
